name: Sheep Reaction
description:
Sheep Reaction  

Meet Dog. Dog is a hard working Australian shepherd on a mission - herd the flock of sheep and call it a day. Can you help Dog towards a well-deserved bowl of treats? But be aware, not all sheep share the same pawsome attitude. Some might even be highly explosive.

Part of the Ubisoft Game Jam 2021

Controls: 

  • Use your mouse to move the doggo 
  • Left mouse click for cute barking

Diversifiers: 

  • TL;DR - Don't use any written language in your game.
  • Universal - Make your game child-friendly (7 and under).
  • Clear view - Don't use any HUD or UI in your game.
  • Fifty Shades - Use only one color for everything.

Team:
